text: Andreas Darmarios or Darmarius (1540 - after 1586) was a copyist and book trader based in Venice.Erika Juhász, Scelus nomine Andreas Darmarius scriptor et veterator nequissimus, Investigatio Fontium, 2014 Aubrey Diller reports in the second paragraph on page 127 in “Two Greek Forgeries of the Sixteenth Century.” that his last name was Darmarius and that he was born around 1560 and died in 1586. ==References== Category:1540 births Category:Year of death unknown Category:Italian scribes Category:16th-century scholars
title: Andreas Darmarios
